graph_title: Percentage of people who eat 5 portions of fruit or vegetables per day
target_name: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
indicator_available: Percentage of people who eat 5 portions of fruit or vegetables per day
indicator_description: Percentage of people who eat 5 portions of fruit or vegetables per day
computation_definitions: Percentage of residents in Bristol who eat 5 portions of fruit or vegetables per day
computation_calculations: No calculations were performed in the data acquisition of this indicator as appropriate data was readily available in the final format specified by this indicator.
source_other_info_1: Data acquired from the National Child Measurement Programme.
